top-1.title: Reliable.
top-1.subTitle: Trusted.
top-1.content: We safeguard your assets and ensure your legacy thrives for generations to come.

top-3.title: Our Strategic
top-3.subTitle: Solutions.
top-3.content: We offer a range of solutions, including Trust Services, Estate Planning, Asset Management, and Corporate Services, to meet your diverse financial needs.

solutions.title: Our Solutions
solutions.subTitle: Solutions Crafted to Fit Your Goals

solution-1.title: Trust Solutions
solution-1.content: Our comprehensive trust services cover personal, family, investment, property, insurance, business value protection, charitable, foreign grantor solutions.

solution-2.title: Estate Planning
solution-2.content: Our estate planning services include tailored will drafting and seamless probate administration, ensuring your wishes are carried out with ease.

solution-3.title: Asset Management
solution-3.content: Our asset management services include family office, private trust company formation, and escrow agent services to safeguard and manage your wealth effectively.

solution-4.title: Corporate Service
solution-4.content: Our cap table management service ensures accurate tracking of ownership, equity distribution, and make informed decisions during fundraising or equity events.

advantage-1.content: Tackle the challenges of integrating cross-border business.

advantage-2.content: Tailored solutions to meet each client's needs.

top-1.title: About
top-1.content: Your Trusted Partner in Financial Protection and Legacy Building.

introduce.title: Expertise You Can Trust
introduce.content: Our mission at Dreamer Group is to safeguard our clients' financial futures by providing expert trust management, estate planning, and asset protection services. We are dedicated to upholding the highest ethical standards, delivering transparent communication, and prioritizing the best interests of our clients in every decision we make.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.content: We operate with honesty and transparency, ensuring that every action is in the best interest of our clients.

clientCentric.title: Client-Centric
clientCentric.content: We prioritize personalized service, tailoring our trust and estate planning solutions to meet the unique needs and goals of each client.

trustworthy.title: Trustworthy
trustworthy.content: We earn the trust of our clients through our long-standing reputation for competence, reliability, and ethical business practices.

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.content: We adhere strictly to all legal and regulatory requirements, ensuring the smooth and secure management of our clients' financial affairs.

accountability.title: Accountability
accountability.content: We hold ourselves accountable for the decisions we make and the service we provide, continuously striving to meet and exceed our clients' expectations.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.content: Our team is committed to delivering high-quality services, with precision and care, to safeguard your assets and ensure financial security.

mission-1.content: Our mission is to provide customized trust solutions that protect and enhance our clients' wealth, ensuring their legacies endure for generations.

mission-2.content: We are committed to solving our clients' unique challenges with personalized service, putting their needs above all else.

mission-3.content: Guided by integrity, professionalism, and trust, we strive to deliver peace of mind and long-term financial security for families and businesses.

top-1.title: Wealth Strategy
top-1.content: Join our expert-led seminars to gain valuable insights on trust and estate planning, with strategies to protect your wealth and secure your legacy.

top-1.title: Let’s Talk About
top-1.content: Visit our FAQ for answers and our blog for expert insights on trust services and financial planning.

top-1.title: We Provide.
top-1.content: We provide comprehensive trust services, tailored to your unique needs and asset protection.

description.subTitle: Focused on solving your challenges, Rather than selling services.
description.content: At Dreamer Group, we focus on solving your unique challenges, not just selling products. We offer customizable trust solutions designed to meet your specific needs, ensuring that your goals and legacy are always our priority.

our-solutions.title: Our Solutions
our-solutions.subTitle: Solutions Crafted to Fit Your Goals

trust-solution.title: Trust Solutions
trust-solution.subTitle: Whether for personal, family, or business needs, our trust services are customized to fit your unique goals.

article-1.title: Personal / Family Trust
article-1.content: A family trust, also known as a family trust fund or discretionary trust, is a legal arrangement designed to hold and manage assets for the benefit of family members.

article-2.title: Investment Trust
article-2.content: An investment trust is a type of trust in which the settlor invests in a diversified portfolio of assets.

article-3.title: Property Trust
article-3.content: A Real Estate Property Trust is a specialized type of trust designed to hold, manage, and sometimes develop real estate properties for the benefit of its beneficiaries.

article-4.title: Insurance Trust
article-4.content: An insurance trust is a specialized trust created to hold and manage life insurance policies for the benefit of designated beneficiaries.

article-5.title: Business Value Protection Trust (BVPT)
article-5.content: A Business Value Protection Trust is a specialized trust designed to safeguard the value of a closely-held business and ensure its continuity in the event of certain triggering events.

article-6.title: Charitable Trust
article-6.content: A charitable trust is a type of trust established for the purpose of benefiting charitable organizations or purposes.

article-7.title: Foreign Grantor Trust
article-7.content: A foreign grantor trust is a type of trust established under the laws of a foreign country by a non-U.S. person, also known as a non-resident alien individual or foreign grantor.

estate-planning.title: Estate Planning
estate-planning.subTitle: Plan for the future with customized strategies that protect your assets and your loved ones.

article-1.title: Will Writing
article-1.content: A will, also known as a last will and testament, is a legal document that enables an individual, known as the testator or testatrix, to outline how their assets and properties should be distributed upon their death.

article-2.title: Probate Administration
article-2.content: Probate administration is the legal process through which a deceased person's assets are distributed and their affairs are settled under the supervision of the probate court.

asset-management.title: Asset Management.
asset-management.subTitle: Ensure your financial legacy endures with expert investment and wealth preservation solutions.

article-1.title: Family Office
article-1.content: A Family Office for high-net-worth individuals (HNWIs) is a specialized wealth management firm focused on overseeing the financial affairs, investments, and legacy planning of affluent families.

article-2.title: Private Trust Company (PTC)
article-2.content: A Private Trust Company setup involves the creation of a specialized entity, established by the founder, to serve as the trustee of a family trust and manage ownership of the family’s assets and businesses.

article-3.title: Escrow Agent
article-3.content: An Escrow Agent Service refers to a tripartite legal arrangement in which funds, assets, or documents are agreed by the contracting parties to be deposited for safekeeping under the trust or custody arrangement of a neutral 3rd party, the escrow agent.

corporate-service.title: Corporate Service
corporate-service.subTitle: Track and manage company’s ownership structure, including shares, options, and other equity interests.

article-1.title: Cap Table
article-1.content: A Cap Table, or Capitalization Table, is a comprehensive document that tracks a company's financing history and equity distribution. It provides a visual representation of who has invested in the company, the amounts raised in each financing round, and the percentage ownership of each investor.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content-1: The information provided on this website is for general information purposes only and does not constitute an offer, and the Website and all information provided to you via the website are provided “as is” and “as available”, the content described herein is subject to change without notice from Dreamer Group Limited and/or any of its members, affiliated entities (Dreamer Group Limited and all its members and affiliated entities collectively referred to as the “Dreamer Group” herein after). We will strive to ensure the integrity and accuracy of the website's functionality and content, while, to the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, we disclaim all express, implied, and statutory warranties with respect to the same, including without limitation any implied warranties of merchantability, satisfactory quality, fitness for a particular purpose, accuracy, completeness, non-infringement, non-interference, error-free service, and uninterrupted service.
disclaimer.content-2: By making available the websites, Dreamer Group is not making an offer of any financial, tax, accounting, legal or other professional services or goods, and none of the information presented on the websites should be construed as finance, tax, accounting, legal or any other professional advice or service. You should always seek the advice of a suitably qualified professional before taking or refraining from taking any action. Dreamer Group will not be liable in any way to any person for any action taken or omitted to be taken as a result of the use of any content posted by us, which results in, causes or gives rise to any loss.
disclaimer.content-3: The laws of some jurisdictions may impose restrictions on the distribution of materials described on this Site. This Site is not directed to persons in jurisdictions where such restrictions apply. If you belong to such areas or you are in such areas, please exit this website immediately and you will be responsible for any losses, controversies, disputes and other negative consequences arising from your continued browsing.
disclaimer.content-4: All information, text and images on this website are copyrighted or registered by DREAMER GROUP.
disclaimer.content-5: We urge all persons contacting Dreamer Group to check the website and service number carefully and to remain vigilant to avoid being deceived or misled by unscrupulous persons.
disclaimer.content-6: This disclaimer is written in Chinese and the English version is provided for information purposes only.

terms.title: 使用協議

terms.content-2: 本使用協議（下簡稱“本協議”）適用於本網站以及任何通過本網站提供的鏈接可以訪問的或通過任何方式可以鏈接到本協議的網站（統稱為“網站”）。
terms.content-3: 本協議包含有關您使用網站的法律權利、補救措施和義務等重要信息，請務必仔細閱讀這些條款，包括但不限於各種限制、排除和賠償。
terms.content-4: 通過訪問網站或使用網站提供的內容和服務，您表明您已經完整閱讀、理解並同意本協議的所有條款，此“同意”將使本協議具有與已簽署的書面協議相同的法律效力。如果您不接受任一條款或條件的約束，或您在此做出的任何陳述是不真實的，您須要立即停止使用網站。
terms.content-6: 為了您更清楚和理解本協議中的內容，我們對條款中和網站上的某些詞彙進行了定義（除非網站其他內容或特別場景另有說明或定義）。
terms.content-7: “內容”指所有材料和內容，包括設計、編輯、文本、圖形、視聽材料、多媒體元素、照片、錄像、音樂、錄音、報告、文件、軟件、信息、公式、模式、數據和任何其他作品。
terms.content-8: “夢想家”、“夢想家集團”或“我們”指夢想家集團有限公司及其所有成員和關聯實體。
terms.content-9: “用戶”指泛指本網站的所有使用者；
terms.content-10: “您”指某一用戶作為本網站個體使用者時的稱呼。
terms.content-12: 本協議中的標題僅為了方便識別，並不構成實質性內容、歸納或定義，也不能被解釋為對任何條款內容的解釋；以及
terms.content-13: 在一般性陳述或術語之後的“包括”、“例如”等同類詞彙及其引導的內容，不應被理解為限制（無論是否使用“不限於”或“但不限於”等非限制性語言或其他類似含義的詞語），兩個以上所列事項之間的“或”並不表示相關事項之間的排他關係。
terms.content-15: 本網站提供有關夢想家集團的信息、服務和產品，本協議中對於“本網站”或“網站”的提及包括網站內提供的不時更新的所有信息及與夢想家集團有關的軟件、內容和功能。
terms.content-16: 本網站及其中的內容僅用於提供信息，均不構成專業建議，任何用戶不應依賴本網站或其中的內容做出決策，包括經營或推廣您的業務、獲得任何形式的融資或資本、獲得任何監管或政府批準，或以其他方式從任何實體獲得服務或其他利益。您應該在進行任何決策或採取任何行動之前咨詢您的專業顧問。
terms.content-18: 本網站以“現狀”為基礎，對其功能或可用性不作任何陳述或保證，也不保證其完整、準確或及時，更不保證您或他人在使用中可能獲得的任何結果。用戶對網站的全部或部分的訪問可能會在任何時候被暫停，而不另行通知。
terms.content-20: 您將只為合法目的使用本網站。如果您在任何時候發現任何個人或實體違反本協議的任何部分，請您將立即聯繫我們，並按要求向我們提供協助，以阻止或補救這種違規行為。

terms.content-56: 本網站可能包含由第三方提供的內容、網站和其他資料的鏈接（統稱為“第三方內容”）。您瀏覽本網站的過程中，可能會閱讀、主動通過鏈接訪問或接受我們向您傳輸適用的第三方內容。

terms.content-64: 在適用法律允許的最大範圍內，對於網站中的任何錯誤或遺漏以及依賴或基於網站提供的信息作出的任何決定或採取的行動而產生的任何損失或損害，包括直接、間接、後果性、特殊或類似的損失或損害，夢想家集團不對您或任何其他人負責或承擔責任。
terms.content-65: 在適用法律允許的最大範圍內，對於網站中的任何錯誤或遺漏以及依賴或基於網站提供的信息作出的任何決定或採取的行動而產生的任何損失或損害，包括直接、間接、後果性、特殊或類似的損失或損害，夢想家集團不對您或任何其他人負責或承擔責任。
terms.content-67: 我們保留在不通知您的情況下隨時修訂這些條款的權利，但我們將盡合理的努力在每次修訂生效前公布這些修訂。我們只有在條款中的規定不再適用或不完整的情況下，才會合理地修訂這些條款。這些條款的最新、完整的修訂版本將在網站上公布。您可以定期查看網站，以便及時獲得此類修訂的通知。如果您在任何修訂的生效日期後繼續使用本網站，您將被視為已接受這些條款的修訂版本。
terms.content-68: 您確認您已經閱讀了本網站上的《私隱政策》，並確認它可能會不時地更新。您進一步確認，在適用法律要求的範圍內，通過使用本網站，您同意我們為指明的目的收集、使用和披露您的個人信息（無論是已收集的還是將要收集的）。
terms.content-69: 在不限制我們任何權利的情況下，我們可以隨時暫停、限制或終止您對網站的使用且無需通知您，如果：
terms.content-70: 本網站、我們或任何第三方的設備或網絡的運行或效率因您對本網站的使用而受損；
terms.content-71: 我們已收到來自第三方關於您對網站的使用或濫用的投訴；
terms.content-72: 您已經或正在違反本文條款中的任何條款或條件；
terms.content-74: 我們基於其他合理的理由。
terms.content-75: 關於任何暫停、限制或終止您對網站的訪問，我們不負責通知任何第三方，包括任何第三方服務、商品或信息的供應商。
terms.content-76: 您對網站以及通過網站所訪問到的內容和功能的使用，構成您對本文條款的同意；就所有法律目的而言，此等同意將被視為書面形式的同意，並作為書面簽署的協議在法律上具有可執行性。
terms.content-77: 如果您不遵守條款，而我們沒有立即採取行動，這並不意味著我們或任何 Dreamer 關聯方放棄了我們/他們可能擁有的任何權利（如在未來採取行動）。
terms.content-78: 若您欲對本文條款或網站提出任何索賠或訴訟，必須在索賠或訴訟理由產生後一年內提出，否則我們將不予承擔相應責任。
terms.content-79: 如果我們向您發出的任何與條款有關的通知、同意、棄權、批準、授權或其他信息，送達或發送至您提供的任何聯繫方式，即被視為已有效地發出。
terms.content-80: 我們可以在任何時候轉移我們在本文條款下的全部或部分權利義務，而無需通知您。未經我們事先書面同意，您不得轉讓您在這些條款下任何權利或義務。您同意這些條款將約束您和我們以及我們各自的個人代表和法定代表人、繼承人及允許的受讓人。
terms.content-81: 您同意，本協議的達成及你對網站的使用，不構成我們與您之間的合資、合夥、信托、雇傭或代理關系。
terms.content-82: 就您使用本網站而言，不時修訂的本協議條款，以及本網站搭載的其他條款（包括但不限於《隱私政策》、《免責聲明》）等，構成了我們與您之間的完整協議。如本文中涵蓋上述某一文本中未盡事宜，則應直接適用本協議中的約定。
terms.content-83: 如果某項條款被認為是不可執行的，這將不會影響任何其他條款
terms.content-84: 本協議及與之相關的所有文件均以中文寫就，英文版本僅供參考。
terms.content-85: 本條款以及由其引起的或與之相關的任何爭議或索賠（包括非合同性爭議或索賠）均受香港法律管轄。香港特別行政區法院對由本協議條款引起的或與之相關的所有爭議和索賠具有專屬管轄權。
